exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H2, y : list (Term A n) H : eqP A eqA n H2 y a', p' : list (Term A n) q' : reduceplus A ?Goal1 ?Goal2 ?Goal3 ?Goal4 ?Goal5 ?Goal6 ?Goal7 ?Goal8 n ?Goal9 ?Goal10 ?Goal11 a' p' s : irreducible A ?Goal1 ?Goal2 ?Goal3 ?Goal4 ?Goal5 ?Goal6 ?Goal7 ?Goal8 n ?Goal9 ?Goal10 ?Goal11 p' Unable to unify "p'" with "a'".

original: intros a b Q H1. unfold reduceplus in H1. unfold s2p in H1. unfold CombLinear in H1. destruct H1 as [H2|H3 H4 H5 H6 H7]; try contradiction. unfold s2p. rewrite H6. apply CombLinear_1. - apply ltM_dec. - unfold s2p. intros a' p' q' s. unfold reduceplus. unfold s2p. unfold CombLinear. right. apply (reduceplus_cb2_lem _ _ _ _ H2 H4). reflexivity.
